name: East Port Motor Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel for 2 nights and was pleasantly surprised. The rooms are large but nothing overly special or updated. The main thing we loved was that the place was clean, the front desk staff was friendly and helpful, we had breakfast included every morning and it was completely reasonably priced. Port Macquarie is a beautiful town that everyone should visit - even for just a day. We loved our time there and at our hotel. Don't expect anything stunning, it's just simple and clean and well looked after. If you're in Port Macquire for a short stay I highly recommend checking out this hotel.
reviews.title: Awesome Deal

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We paid AUD99/night which came with continental room service breakfast. Room #105 - Ground floor, opp. the Reception.
reviews.title: Great value!

reviews.text: Room was great! Though small but modern furnishing. Free wireless internet too! Very good value! Personal rating: 7/10 ;)
reviews.title: Praise for the Best Western Port Macquarie!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location wise - not exactly very near town centre or Koala Hospital. Perhaps at least 20min walk.
reviews.title: Excellent value

likes.liked: — Pet freindly and great value and service

reviews.title: Clean, quirky, cheap....
reviews.text: Far from chain motels and 5-star palaces, this Best Western has a lot of charm and personality.

description: Welcome to East Port Motor Inn, a AAA rated 3.5 star property.East Port Motor Inn is a leisurely walk from the white sands of Oxley & Town Beaches and just 15 minutes walk to the CBD shops, restaurants & cafes (3 mins drive).Landscaped gardens surround our twenty three newly renovated and refurbished rooms. Port City Bowling Club is just around the corner. Scenic walks, historical sites, sporting facilities and the Koala Hospital are all nearby.Austar TV & Wireless Broadband are free and included in all rooms.Service, quality and convenience await you at East Port Motor Inn, Port Macquarie. We highly value your patronage and will endeavour to make your stay as pleasant and relaxing as possible.Book Direct & Save!Our lowest prices always appear on our website.No deposit or charge is made to your credit card until your arrival at East Port Motor Inn.
